original_text: I had seen a vision like this when I was beside the Kebar River. I had also seen a vision like this when God came to destroy Jerusalem. I bent down low with my face on the ground.
korean_text: 그 모양이 내가 본 환상 곧 전에 성읍을 멸하러 올 때에 보던 환상 같고 그발 강 가에서 보던 환상과도 같기로 내가 곧 얼굴을 땅에 대고 엎드렸더니

sentences.original_text: I had seen a vision like this
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이와 같은 이상을 본 적이 있었다

sentences.original_text: when I was beside the Kebar River
I had also seen a vision like this
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 이와 같은 이상을 본 적이 있었다

sentences.original_text: when God came to destroy Jerusalem
with my face on the ground
